rows.label: tev013701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Graham about the jobs held by NLA's civilians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Graham if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Graham about the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Graham about the cars in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Graham about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013701_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Graham about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013701_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Graham about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0001
rows.name:
We hold all sorts of jobs. Running businesses in the
commercial district, developing weapons for the arms
manufacturers, working in sales and distribution...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Before we arrived on this planet, I actually worked at
Sakuraba Industries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0003
rows.name:
But when I saw the rich wilderness of Mira stretching
out before me, I could no longer bear the thought of
wasting my life in the corporate world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0004
rows.name:
I resigned my position and worked to establish my
own recycling company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Creating a business like that in a place like this is
quite a challenge. But I'm confident that I'll get it
off the ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0008
rows.name:
Lately, ne'er-do-wells have been gathering in the back
alley behind Barista Court.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0009
rows.name:
I hear they're stealing things from people's vehicles
and even assaulting passers-by![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0010
rows.name:
You look like you know how to handle yourself in a
fight, but even so, you should be careful if you ever
find yourself down that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Apparently even some of New LA's toughest Mediators
have been trounced by those thugs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Have you noticed those orange-colored pods floating
around inside their ship?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Those are apparently where the Ma-non live.
Each pod is a little room.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0021
rows.name:
A Ma-non showed me the inside of one when I went
up to sell them some components.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0022
rows.name:
They're quite tiny. Just enough room for a place to
sleep and a fridge full of pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'm impressed that they can live that way.
They don't seem to care about creature comforts at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0038
rows.name:
All of the cars in New LA are government issued,
which is why they all look so similar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Doesn't it make you sort of sad to see that?
Or maybe you're not as much of a car lover as I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0040
rows.name:
If you are, I'd be happy to customize your car for you.
I'll do it for a very low price![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0041
rows.name:
Heh heh. Maybe you'd like a classic 80's muscle car!
That's got to get your blood pumping, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0042
rows.name:
Until now, Professor B has been sending me a steady
stream of product orders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0043
rows.name:
But now, he's suddenly cut off all contact.
Hasn't even paid for the orders I've already delivered![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0044
rows.name:
He wouldn't just disappear on me like that, would he?
Some of the items he requested were extremely difficult
to acquire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0045
rows.name: If he has skipped out, I'm going to be ruined...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0046
rows.name:
Some of the parts Professor B ordered were extremely
difficult to acquire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0047
rows.name: If he's run out on me without paying, I'm done for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0048
rows.name:
Yeah, but maybe he'll come back soon, right?
He didn't seem like the type to skip out on the check.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0049
rows.name: Er, there's a good chance of that, isn't there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0059
rows.name:
All of the cars in New LA are government issued,
which is why they all look so similar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0060
rows.name:
Doesn't it make you sort of sad to see that?
Or maybe you're not as much of a car lover as I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0061
rows.name:
If you are, I'd be happy to customize your car for you.
I'll do it for a very low price![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0062
rows.name:
After all, you don't seem like the sort who would rack
up a debt and then skip town.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Graham about the products from Factory 1.21.

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0068
rows.name:
The key feature of our products is the unparalleled
strength of their gravity attributes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0069
rows.name:
The power of the gravitational waves they emit even
rivals gravitational fields generated by time travel!
...Or at least that's what Professor B claimed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0070
rows.name:
But even putting aside the truth of that claim, there's
no denying that our products are created with many
incredible, never-before-utilized technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0071
rows.name:
So please buy as many as you can afford so I can
pay down my debts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0063
rows.name:
Before I could figure out what was happening,
I suddenly had a job at Factory 1.21.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0067
rows.name:
Now I'll have Professor B as my boss and Veven as my
project manager.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0064
rows.name:
But if the company succeeds, they'll repay my debts,
so I guess that's all the incentive I need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0065
rows.name:
Now that it's come to this, I'll just have to keep selling
our products until I finally surpass my old employers
at Sakuraba.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013701_MSG0066
rows.name: I'd certainly be grateful to have you as a customer.[ST:wait ]
